newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Ng Fung Hong hits high on injection rumour.
newsitem.headline: Ng Fung Hong hits high on injection rumour.

text.p: Shares of live and frozen foodstuffs distributor Ng Fung Hong Ltd hit an all time high of HK$4.475 before ending Thursday at HK$4.45, up HK$0.40 or 9.88 percent from the previous close.
Volume was 36.27 million shares worth HK$155.53 million.

"Rumours of an injection of refrigerator factories by Ng Fung Hong's parent into the company, plus a wave of buying interest for China-related stocks, boosted demand," said a sales manager at a regional brokerage.
The company's officials were not immediately available for comment. -- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843 6370
